definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Of course, e-mail is just one piece of the digital pie.
sentences.chinese: 當然，email只是這張“數碼餅圖”上的一小塊。

sentences.english: For pie charts, the sum of the array is your whole pie.
sentences.chinese: 對於餅圖，數組之和是整個餅。

sentences.english: The pie chart displays the proportion in which the business service was invoked within a given duration by the organizations. The definitions of the columns of the Utilization Details table are
sentences.chinese: 餅圖顯示在給定的時間段內組織調用業務服務的比例。
